title: Bacteria bide their time when antibiotics attack

title_detail.value: Bacteria bide their time when antibiotics attack

summary: Scientists have built a model to predict how long, on average, it takes to eradicate a bacterial infection with antibiotics. The model could help doctors fight resistance by prescribing antibiotics that neither over- or under-dose a patient.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have built a model to predict how long, on average, it takes to eradicate a bacterial infection with antibiotics. The model could help doctors fight resistance by prescribing antibiotics that neither over- or under-dose a patient.
